Anybody having success with this?

This one really work!! How do I know this? Because I'm writing this in Safari running in Mac OS X running on my PC with an AMD Sempron 2500+

It's worth the download.
Anyone get this bootable, if so tell me how. :)

Just burn the iso-file to an empty DVD and it's bootable. When the meny appears just select the default options. 

Also remember to install to an empty harddrive. The minimum partition-size is 6GB.

The first thing you have to do is to create a partition. The difficult part is to find the diskpartition-tool when the GUI starts. It's in the finder-menu. It doesn't appear automatically.

When you have created a partition with the hfs+ filesystem, go ahead with the install-wizard.

I hope this was helpful  :-)

I was  able to install this version but when I boot my laptop Dell D600, it would come up with the error message saying I needed to restart my pc.  So I installed the tiger 10.4.1 generic install DVD and then used the 10.4.3 to upgrade. It worked !
10.4.1 did not recognize my sound card but the network card worked. 
After the upgrade, my network card is not recognized but my sound works...
